tools.title: Sublime Text 4
tools.description: I don’t care if it’s missing all of the fancy IDE features everyone else relies on, Sublime Text is still the best text editor ever made.

tools.title: iTerm2
tools.description: I’m honestly not even sure what features I get with this that aren’t just part of the macOS Terminal but it’s what I use.

tools.title: TablePlus
tools.description: Great software for working with databases. Has saved me from building about a thousand admin interfaces for my various projects over the years.
